DOC.brief_summary: This phase II study design demonstrate ability LFB-R593 effectively eliminate exogenously-administered RhD-positive red blood cell circulation RhD-negative individual , thereby prevent RhD-alloimmunisation .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Study LFB-R593 , A Monoclonal Anti-RhD Antibody , Healthy RhD Negative Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy RhDnegative volunteer Males definitively sterile female No prior sensitization RhD antigen Healthy RhDpositive volunteer
